function_reachability: Is there a call path from function 'main' to function 'printf'?
Is it impossible for function 'printf' to reach function 'main'?
loop_reachability: Can the loop with condition 'i < N' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'i < N' always executed?
Can the loop with condition 'j < N' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'j < N' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i < N' without passing through its header block?
Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'j < N' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Does the value assigned to 'a (line 6)' affect subsequent computations?
Does the value assigned to 'b (line 6)' affect subsequent computations?
liveness: Does variable 'x' remain in use at the end of function 'main'?
Is variable 'i' live at the end of function 'main'?
dead_code: Can the statement 'for (j = 0; j < N; j++) {' be considered dead code?
Is this statement not dead: “for (x = 0; x < N; x++)”?
